cheatsheet.title: Starting from the Alarm Radio example

intro.description: Learn how to import the Alarm Radio project provided with SysML Designer as example.

item.title: Import the Alarm Radio project
item.description: Click in the title bar and select File > New > Example > SysML > Simple AlarmRadio System Example. Click on 'Next ' and then 'Finish'.

item.title: Navigate through the example project
item.description: The org.obeonetwork.sysml.alarmradio.example project appears in the 'Model Explorer' view. You can navigate to the existing diagrams by selecting items under the 'AlarmRadio.aird' file. For example if you double-click on AlarmRadio.aird > SysML > Block Definition Diagram > bdd [package] AlarmRadio [AlarmRadio diagram], the example block definition diagram will be opened in a new editor.
